p: Motivated by the aforementioned findings and in continuation to our previous work, in the present study, a novel series of isatin/indole conjugates ( 7a-j and 9a-e, Figure 1) were designed and synthesised. The antiproliferative effect of the new compounds against HT-29 and SW-620 colorectal cancer cell lines were examined. In addition, the levels of the mitochondria-related anti-apoptotic proteins Bcl2 and BclxL in HT-29 and SW-620 colorectal cancer cell lines after incubation with isatin derivatives 7c and 7g were determined.
